item.description:
Good Evening Coffee Talkers,

Do any of you enjoy going out to the movies?

4/19/08

21 starts at 7:20.

It will still be a good idea to get there at 7:00
To have time to get tickets and get to our seats.

Going to Wallingford Theater from New Haven

Take I 91

Get off Exit 15 to Rt 68

Take a left on Rt 68 to Rt 5.

Take a right on Rt. 5 and
Drive until you get to the Theater

End of 4/19 Memo


Who wants to go see a movie flick in Wallingford?

http://www.holidaycin...

www.holidaycinemas10.com/

http://local.yahoo.co...

local.yahoo.com/details?id=35086400


We are going to see the Movie 21.

From USA article on March 26, 2008

http://www.usatoday.c...

www.usatoday.com/life/movies/news/2008-03-25-jeff-ma-21_N.htm

Yahoo Review

http://movies.yahoo.c...

movies.yahoo.com/movie/1809834187/info


Good Place for Movie Reviews

http://www.wafflemovi...

www.wafflemovies.com/


Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Wait in front of the Theater on the right hand side for 15 minutes.
item.why: Who wants to Meet Up at the Movies in Wallingford on a Sunday Night?
item.name: Have a Coffee After Seeing a Movie in Wallingford - 4/20
